options.header:
<style type="text/css">
    div.f-heading {
        display: flex;
        flex-wrap: nowrap;
        justify-content: flex-end !important;
        align-items: center;
        flex-grow: 1;
        background-color: #FFF  !important;
    }
    
    
    div.f-item { text-align: left; }
    div.collapse-info { background-color: #f4f4f4; };
    
    .json-menu-nested-root {
        border-left: 0 !important;
        border-right: 0 !important;
    }
</style>
options.javascript:
<script type="text/javascript">
    window.addEventListener('emsReady', function () {
         $('[data-toggle="tooltip"]').tooltip();
         
        var filterForm = document.getElementById('form-filters');
        filterForm.addEventListener('change', function () {
            filterForm.submit();
        });
    });
</script>
